title: CFCs are most efficient GHGs at trapping heat

content.question: Although levels of CFCs in the atmosphere are much lower than those of CO2 , CFCs are still potent greenhouse gases because they

choices.label: remain in the atmosphere for only a brief time
are much more efficient at absorbing thermal radiation
circulate through the troposphere more easily than CO2 does
are more difficult to remove from smokestacks and tailpipes

content.answer: are much more efficient at absorbing thermal radiation
